style="text;strokeColor=none;align=center;fillColor=none;html=1;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="840" y="490" width="154" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
Fact: The Eiffel Tower is in Paris.
Judgement: support or not
Token_allocation:

switch.text: Fact: The Eiffel Tower is in Paris...

C. London D. Boston
